title: The married-womans case, or, Good counsell to mayds, to be carefull of hastie marriage by the example of other married-women : to the tune of The married-mans case / [by] M.P.
author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?
notes: Attributed to Martin Parker by STC (2nd ed.).
Single sheet cut in two parts. Right half contains "The second part. To the same tune."
Imperfect: torn, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
